thread.title: Watch Anderson .Paak Perform “Come Down” With Hometown Gospel Choir
thread.title_full: Watch Anderson .Paak Perform “Come Down” With Hometown Gospel Choir

author: Evan Minsker
title: Watch Anderson .Paak Perform “Come Down” With Hometown Gospel Choir
text:
Watch Anderson .Paak Perform “Come Down” With Hometown Gospel Choir Filmed as part of the Grammys’ “Believe in Music” campaign Anderson .Paak Photo by Erika Goldring/FilmMagic 
The 59th Annual Grammy Awards happen this Sunday. In the run-up to the big show, they’ve launched the “Believe in Music” ad campaign. Anderson .Paak —a Best New Artist nominee—stars in the below edition. He performs the Malibu track “ Come Down ” with a gospel choir in his hometown—Oxnard, California. The video features appearances from .Paak’s friends and family. Watch it below.
